sentences.sContent: The island, the smallest of the Canadian provinces, is home to a variety of showy fall species: maple, oak, birch, quaking aspen and poplar, each contributing its own hue to the polychrome landscape.
sentences.sContent_eng: The island, the smallest of the Canadian provinces, is home to a variety of showy fall species: maple, oak, birch, quaking aspen and poplar, each contributing its own hue to the polychrome landscape.
sentences.sCn: 这个岛屿是加拿大最小的省份，有着各式各样艳丽的树种：枫树、橡树、桦树、颤杨和白杨，它们各自为那里的多姿多彩风景提供了自己所独有的色调。

trans.tranOther: a very tall straight thin tree that grows very fast
